WorkItem.Summary: "Illegal property access" error could be more informative

Comments.Message:
Thanks for reporting.  In the 0.9.0 branch, this error goes away completely, due to changes we have made with index signatures.  Specifically, section 3.7.4 now states: 

â€¢	String index signatures, specified using index type string, define type constraints for all properties and numeric index signatures in the containing type. Specifically, in a type with a string index signature of type T, all properties and numeric index signatures must have types that are subtypes of T.

The latest language spec should be in the GIT repository, and the 0.9.0 compiler under development can be used from there also.
